entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind east 20 km/h. High 10. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
